thread.title: Corey Taylor: What's The Difference Between Slipknot & Stone Sour For Me [News]
thread.title_full: Corey Taylor: What's The Difference Between Slipknot & Stone Sour For Me [News]

title: Corey Taylor: What's The Difference Between Slipknot & Stone Sour For Me [News]
text:
Posted 19 hours ago 12 
Corey Taylor discussed how different it is for him to perform with Slipknot and Stone Sour, branding the two acts significantly separate beasts. 
He said on the ETC Show : "They're both serious physical work. With Stone Sour, you almost have to work twice as hard because with Slipknot sometimes you can almost let the mask do a lot of the work for ya. 
"You just stand in this creepy position and creep the hell out of the 14-year-olds on the barricade. But with Stone Sour, I've always tried to create a real juxtaposition with that, where it's like - Slipknot is theatrical and dark, and Stone Sour is much more of a party. It's very - I don't wanna say positive - but it's a much more lighter atmosphere, and you can definitely see my sense of humor a little more."The singer added: "Both are very taxing - I'm not young anymore and it kicks the crap out of me. That's why I try to stay fit, I work out 5 or 6 days a week just to stay fit. I changed my diet, I quit smoking, I don't do drugs all because my career is important to me. It's worth it. The proof's in the pudding when you come see us play - it's on from the second we hit the stage. 
"So they're both very - I don't wanna say extreme, but they're pretty... you exert a lot of energy, but I get different things out of both."
